translations: （地质）前进变质作用的，进化变质作用的；（与其他天体）同向旋转的，顺行的

sentences.sentence: Prograde orbits are more vulnerable than retrograde ones.
sentences.translation: 因此顺行的轨道会比逆行轨道更加脆弱。

sentences.sentence: Concepts of metamorphism, metamorphic reaction, prograde and retro - metamorphisms.
sentences.translation: 变质岩的一般概念、变质反应、进变质和退变质。

sentences.sentence: If accretion takes place in eccentric orbits as well, the rotation will be prograde and of the right order of magnitude.
sentences.translation: 如果吸积发生在偏心轨道，则自转将是正向的，且快慢也合适。
